home.title:
Welcome to Copy
& Printshop 't Hartje
home.subtitle: A trusted name in Groningen for over 45 years.
home.introduction:
We are your go-to destination for everything related to copying, printing, and press services.
We also offer a wide range of office supplies and cartridges.

copyPrint.title: Copy & Print
copyPrint.introduction: Fast printing or copying, from letters to reports. Make use of our self-service.

customPrinting.title: Custom Print
customPrinting.introduction: Professional printing for your communication materials and promotional tools.

customClothing.title: Custom Clothing
customClothing.introduction: Personalize your clothing and textiles with unique prints.

officeSupplies.title: Office Supplies
officeSupplies.introduction: Everything you need to set up and optimize your workspace for efficiency.

contact.title: Got a question?
contact.subtitle:
Can't find the right product or price?
Or would you like to know more about submitting assignments?
You can always request a free, no-obligation quote via:

introduction.title: Clothing Printing
introduction.text:
We offer various techniques for printing your clothing.
We can print and cut on flex material, which is ideal for a logo or text in a single color.
Additionally, we have a DTG machine, which stands for Direct To Garment. This allows us to print directly onto clothing.
introduction.subText: If you bring your own clothing, please keep the following in mind:
introduction.listItem2: Printing on your own clothing is at your own risk

stickers.title: Stickers
stickers.introduction: Our stickers are available in various sizes, shapes, and quantities, fully tailored to your needs. Whether you require round, oval, large, or small stickers, we offer the perfect solution.
stickers.largeFormatContent: Large-format stickers can easily be ordered individually.
stickers.materialContent: All stickers are produced on high-gloss, self-adhesive white vinyl of premium quality, perfectly suited for a wide range of applications.

cards.title: Business Cards
cards.introduction: Minimale afname 100 stuks, de kaartjes worden geprint op 350gr.papier. De prijzen zijn op basis van een en het zelfde bestand. Dubbel gevouwen visitekaartjes is prijs keer 2. De kaartjes worden gesneden en u krijgt een plastic bewaardoosje.

flyers.title: Flyers
flyers.introductionFlyers: Here you will find an overview of the costs for printing flyers in A5 and A6 formats, with options for single- and double-sided printing. Choose from a variety of paper types to create the perfect look for your flyers.
flyers.alert: Click on the a category below to view the pricing list.

folders.title: Folders
folders.introductionFolders: Here you will find an overview of the costs for printing brochures in A3 and A4 formats. Choose between a bi-fold or tri-fold option to present your message effectively. The rates are clearly displayed by paper type and quantity.

copyPrintPage.title: Easy and quickly
copyPrintPage.introduction: Easily and quickly take care of your copies and prints using our services. Our self-service printers allow you to print documents directly from a USB stick or download them from your email.
copyPrintPage.introductionBinding: We also offer binding and laminating services to give your documents a neat and professional finish. Perfect for business purposes, school projects, or personal documents!

contactPage.messageAlert: Don't forget to include your contact details.
